note: Climate Reality Bay Area member. Abled cishet settler, she/her, Person of the Global Majority (PGM) / Person of Color (PoC). On unceded occupied Coast Miwok lands. Anti-Blackness and anti-Indigeneity are the roots of the #ClimateCrisis. Avatar pic is a Western screech owl sitting on mat outside the screen patio door with my Maine Coon cat inside, fixated on the owl. Header pic is Canadian Rockies teal colored alpine lake with the afternoon sun about to go behind a mountain.
